decision_reasoning: Prothonotaries can order production of confidential documents if relevant and necessary
result_of_case: Confidential documents must be produced after redacting irrelevant parts
application_details: Lilly sought Teva's confidential trial transcripts and judgments for trade-spend data
procedure_followed: Motion before Prothonotary Tabib, followed by appeal to Federal Court
dispute_focus: Dispute over production of confidential documents during litigation discovery
